DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy two lubricate eye drop treatment dry eye sign symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Cross-Over Evaluation Two Lubricating Eye Drops
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 18 yrs old 2 . Males females 3 . Any race ethnic background 4 . Patients present ocular surface discomfort SESoD score least 2 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Contact lens use day examination . 3 . Corneal ectasia . 4 . Current use Restasis
